pages.text: $(item)Netherosia$() is a Food item that can be cooked in the $(pot)Ultimate Crock Pot$() with 1 $(item)Collected Dust$() and any 3 $(thing)fillers$(). It takes 40 seconds to cook.$(br2)$(item)Netherosia$() cannot be eaten by player. $(thing)Piglin$() bartered with Netherosia will toss a random item included $(item)Netherite Scrap$() to the player.
